tool_description: Download any youtube video in 1080p for free without the hassle!
name: Youtube download API
title: Youtube download API

api_list.name: Mp4 download
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-download-api.p.rapidapi.com/dQw4w9WgXcQ/mp4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-download-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-download-api.p.rapidapi.com/{youtube_id}/mp4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-download-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
